# Free AI Writing &  
Text Generation Tools  

Stay in your workflow by accelerating routine and challenging writing with
Grammarly’s AI writer. Our AI writing assistance helps you instantly generate
quality text for emails, articles, reports, and more.  

**Get Grammarly** It’s free

## AI-Generated Text When You Need It  

From the first words on a blank page to the finished product, our AI text
generator is your co-creator and confidence booster. AI writing powered by
Grammarly provides end-to-end writing assistance that helps you generate text
and suggests revisions until your work is  
at its best.  

Paraphrasing

Quickly create high-quality paraphrases—reword sentences for emails, articles,
and more.

Cover Letter

Land the job you want by generating a professional, personalized cover letter.

Job Description

Attract quality candidates by instantly generating a standout job description.

Résumé Skills

Speed up job applications by creating a compelling list of résumé skills in
seconds.

Formal Letter

Accelerate the writing process for business or personal letters.

Email

Get the responses you want by generating concise, personable email copy.

Instagram Caption

Instantly brainstorm Instagram caption ideas that match any photo or video.

Business Plan

Create an actionable, one-page business plan that aligns with your goals.

Business Report

Generate business collateral that resonates with your audience.

Article

Overcome writer’s block by quickly generating article drafts.

## Contextually Aware, Personalized AI That Helps You Write  

Grammarly's AI writing assistant understands the context of your communication
so you can generate high-quality, relevant content.  

Automatically generate a draft using simple command prompts.  

Adjust text for formality, tone, and length with a few clicks.  

Layer on our communication assistance to ensure it’s polished.  

## Frequently Asked Questions  

 ****  

### What is a text generator?

An AI text generator, powered by a large language model (LLM) and natural
language processing approaches, is software that composes text. When prompted,
AI text generators can create topic ideas, emails, blog posts, articles, and
more.  

### How is AI text generated?

When you enter a specific request into an AI writing assistant, it is called a
prompt. Prompts can be sentences or short phrases giving direction. They can
include commands such as “Write an email congratulating the sales team on
closing 30% more deals than in the previous quarter.”  

### Why use an AI content writer?

Using an AI content writer helps unblock ideas and increase productivity.
Generating AI writing lets you instantly compose, ideate, rewrite, and reply
with an AI co-creator that’s informed by your context and goals.  

### What kinds of content can an AI writing assistant create?

AI writing assistants help you instantly brainstorm and generate ideas,
outlines, and documents. They can co-create text for emails, articles,
letters, résumés, and more.  

### What is the best AI text generator?

When you enter an instructional prompt, an AI text generator can help you work
faster and more productivley. With a Grammarly account, you gain access to
Grammarly's AI text generator that works for you directly in apps and on sites
such as Gmail, Google Docs, Microsoft Word, LinkedIn, and Medium.  

### How do I generate text with Grammarly?

Download Grammarly, open a document, and click the Grammarly button to launch
Grammarly’s AI writing assistance. Then, enter a prompt with instructions and
key information to help personalize your writing.  

### Who can use Grammarly’s free AI text generation?

Anyone with a Grammarly account can use Grammarly’s generative AI features for
end-to-end writing assistance that helps generate text and suggests revisions.
Grammarly's generative AI is available in beta and pairs with our Free,
Premium, Grammarly Business, and Grammarly for Education product offerings to
provide contextually aware, personalized AI assistance to help write drafts,
rewrite for tone and length, brainstorm to unlock creativity, and compose
email replies.  

### How is my data kept safe when I generate text with Grammarly?

Grammarly has a long-standing commitment to developing AI responsibly and
upholding user privacy and enterprise data security. We never sell user data.
Learn more about our security and privacy principles and practices at our
Trust Center.  

### What else does Grammarly offer in addition to AI text generation?

For more than a decade, Grammarly has built AI-enabled products to help people
communicate effectively and accelerate writing tasks, champion their voice,
forge connections, and spur academic or professional growth. Grammarly’s
communication assistance offers consistent, real-time writing feedback across
popular browsers, operating systems, and devices.  

## Improve Your Writing With AI  

Join the 30 million people who use Grammarly to get better writing results in
less time.  

 **Get Grammarly** It’s free
